控制插件界面显示的语言: Set the language of the plugin interface
控制设置页面的主题样式: Set the theme of the settings page
控制翻译悬浮窗、输入翻译器等组件的主题样式: Set the theme for translation popup and input translator
可将插件所有设置导出为 JSON 文件，或从 JSON 文件导入并完全覆盖当前配: Export all settings as a JSON file, or import from a JSON file to fully overwrite current config. The page will auto-refresh after import.
设置网页整体翻译的目标语言: Set the target language for full page translation
设置划词/输入翻译的默认目标语言: Set the default target language for selection/input translation
你常用的目标语言，优先用于自动选择: Your preferred target languages, prioritized for auto selection
这些语言不会被自动翻译: These languages will never be translated automatically
这些语言会被自动翻译为你的目标语言: These languages will always be translated to your target language
选择用于翻译的默认引擎，支持多引擎兜底: Select the default engine for translation, supports multi-engine fallback
获取方式：访问 https://www.deepl.com/ 注册账号，在账户设: How to get: Visit https://www.deepl.com/ to register an account, find the API section in account settings to get a free API Key
请先在设置中配置 DeepL API Key: Please configure DeepL API Key in settings first
开启后划词/输入内容将自动翻译，无需手动点击: Automatically translate selection/input without manual action
翻译完成后自动朗读结果（如支持）: Automatically read the result after translation (if supported)
所有设置均会自动保存，无需手动操作。: All settings are saved automatically, no manual action required.
大部分设置会自动保存，DeepL API Key 需要点击保存按钮。: Most settings are saved automatically, DeepL API Key requires clicking the save button.
未检测到日语语音，已用默认语音朗读: No Japanese voice detected, using default voice
复制失败，可能是浏览器限制或权限问题: Copy failed, possibly due to browser restrictions
本插件用于网页划词翻译，支持多语言切换和自动翻译。: This extension is for web page selection translation, supporting multi-language switching and auto translation.
确定要清空所有配置吗？此操作不可恢复，将重置所有设置到默认状态。: Are you sure you want to clear all configurations? This action cannot be undone and will reset all settings to default.
配置已清空，页面即将刷新: Configuration cleared, page will refresh shortly
清空配置失败，请重试: Failed to clear configuration, please try again
清空所有配置并重置到默认状态。此操作不可恢复，请谨慎使用。: Clear all configurations and reset to default state. This action cannot be undone, please use with caution.
选中文字后，双击 Ctrl 键即可快速翻译: After selecting text, double-click Ctrl to translate quickly
可以设置自定义快捷键替代默认的 Ctrl 双击: You can set a custom shortcut to replace the default Ctrl double-click
开启后可以使用快捷键进行划词翻译: Enable shortcut keys for selection translation
选择用于触发划词翻译的快捷键组合: Choose the shortcut combination to trigger selection translation
设置双击判定的时间间隔，数值越小越灵敏: Set the time interval for double-click detection, smaller values are more sensitive
选中文字后，使用设定的快捷键即可快速翻译: After selecting text, use the configured shortcut to translate quickly
默认快捷键为 Ctrl + 双击，可根据个人习惯调整: Default shortcut is Ctrl + double-click, can be adjusted according to personal preference
双击时间阈值影响双击判定的灵敏度: Double-click time threshold affects the sensitivity of double-click detection
关闭快捷键功能后，仍可通过点击翻译图标进行翻译: After disabling shortcut function, translation can still be performed by clicking the translation icon
点击下方按钮录制快捷键，或手动输入（如：ctrl+shift+t）: Click the button on the right to record shortcut, or manually enter (e.g., ctrl+shift+t)
Please press the shortcut combination you want to set...
支持组合键，如 Ctrl+Shift+T、Alt+F1 等。点击\"开始录制\": Supports key combinations like Ctrl+Shift+T, Alt+F1, etc. Click "Start Recording" then press the shortcut to auto-detect.
自定义快捷键支持组合键，如 Ctrl+Shift+T: Custom shortcuts support key combinations like Ctrl+Shift+T
这将删除所有翻译缓存，确定要继续吗？: This will delete all translation cache. Are you sure?
显示当前缓存的条目数和占用空间大小: Shows the number of cache entries and space used
超过此时间的缓存将被自动删除: Cache older than this will be deleted automatically
达到此数量时将删除最旧的缓存: Oldest cache will be deleted when this number is reached
• 翻译缓存可以显著提高重复翻译的速度: • Translation cache can significantly speed up repeated translations
• 缓存会自动过期，确保翻译结果的时效性: • Cache will expire automatically to ensure translation freshness
• 缓存数据仅存储在本地，不会上传到服务器: • Cache data is stored locally only, not uploaded to server
• 清空缓存不会影响翻译功能，只是需要重新翻译: • Clearing cache does not affect translation, but will require re-translation
启用缓存可以加快重复翻译的速度: Enabling cache can speed up repeated translations.
加入白名单的网站会自动整页翻译: Sites in the whitelist will be auto-translated as a whole page
加入黑名单的网站不会被自动整页翻译: Sites in the blacklist will not be auto-translated as a whole page
选择整页翻译时的显示方式：仅显示译文或原文与译文对照: Choose how to display full page translation: only translated or original with translation side by side
